' + '[' + pyfile + '] ' + str) f.close()# å®šä¹‰é€šçŸ¥ä¿¡æ¯çˆ¬å–def requestHTML(index_url): response = requests.get(index_url, headers=headers) response.encoding = charset page = etree.HTML(response.text) title = page.xpath(title_xpath) title_url = page.xpath(title_url_xpath) title_date = page.xpath(title_date_xpath) return title, title_url, title_date# å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“æ’å…¥def pymongo_insert(): myclient = pymongo.MongoClient("mongodb://root:abcde123@xxxxx.com:27017/") mydb = myclient[database] mycol = mydb[collection] title, title_url, title_date = requestHTML(index_url) insert_results = {'success': 0, 'failure': 0} for (t1, t2, t3) in zip(title, title_url, title_date): if is_title_url_prefixion is 1: t2 = t2.replace('..', title_url_prefixion) else: pass added_date = f'{datetime.datetime.now():%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S}' mydict = {"title": t1, "title_url": t2, "title_date": t3, "is_new": 1, "source": source, "added_date": added_date} print(mydict) if mycol.find_one({"title": t1}) is None: # ä»¥æ ‡é¢˜æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒä½œä¸ºåˆ¤æ–­æ–°æ—§é€šçŸ¥æ ‡å‡† result = mycol.insert_one(mydict) insert_results['success'] = insert_results['success'] + 1 else: insert_results['failure'] = insert_results['failure'] + 1 write_info(f'{datetime.datetime.now():%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S} æ’å…¥æˆåŠŸ{insert_results["success"]}æ¡,{insert_results["failure"]}æ¡æ•°æ®å·²å­˜åœ¨')if __name__ == "__main__": # å¡«å…¥ä¿¡æ¯ charset = "gb2312" index_url = "http://yz.cuc.edu.cn/listWYFHY/list_0_1.htm" database = "campus_info_spider" collection = "yz_cuc_edu_cn" is_title_url_prefixion = 1 title_url_prefixion = 'http://yz.cuc.edu.cn' source = "ä¸­å›½ä¼ åª’å¤§å­¦ç ”æ‹›åŠ" title_xpath = '//*[@id="CONTENT_MAIN"]/table[1]/tr[position()<=last()]/td[1]/a/text()' title_url_xpath = '//*[@id="CONTENT_MAIN"]/table[1]/tr[position()<=last()]/td[1]/a/@href' title_date_xpath = '//*[@id="CONTENT_MAIN"]/table[1]/tr[position()<=last()]/td[2]/text()' headers = { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0;
